brandDescription.message: Free Translate Website, Translate PDF & Epub eBook, Translate Video Subtitles in Bilingual

toggleTranslateToThePageEndImmediately.message: Translate instantly to the bottom of the page/Display original text

toggleMouseHoverTranslateDirectly.message: Temporarily enable or disable direct translation by mouse hover on the page

translateWithOpenAI.message: Temporarily translate the current page with OpenAI

translateWithDeepL.message: Temporarily translate the current page with DeepL

translateWithGoogle.message: Temporarily translate the current page with Google

translateWithBing.message: Temporarily translate the current page with Microsoft Translator

translateWithGemini.message: Temporarily translate the current page with Gemini

translateWithTransmart.message: Temporarily translate the current page with Tencent Translator

translateInputBox.message: Translate the content of the current input box

toggleTranslationMask.message: Toggle blur effect on translated text (learning mode) for the current page

toggleVideoSubtitlePreTranslation.message: Switch Video Subtitles with Immersive Translation Feature

brandDescriptionForSafari.message: Free Translate Website, Translate PDF & Epub eBook, Translate Video Subtitles in Bilingual

translateWithClaude.message: Temporarily use Claude to translate the current page.

translateWithCustom1.message: Temporary use of custom translation services to translate the current page(1)

translateWithCustom2.message: Temporary use of custom translation services to translate the current page(2)

translateWithCustom3.message: Temporary use of custom translation services to translate the current page(3)
